revision.text: This is going to be a more complicated {{skip me}} test that includes all of the different types [[skip me]] of formatting that we want to skip, [skip me] to make sure you combined your regular expressions {|skip me|} properly. A file:| to skip. More valid text. <Skip me.> Let's even include duplicates of some {{skip me too}} to make sure we still include what we should [[last, skip me]].
